parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector that specifies the direction of the ordinate dimension

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line start point

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line end point

parameters.name: P4
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector and specifies the orientation of the text; for example, (1, 0, 0) results in horizontal text read from left to right

parameters.name: P5
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Inclination angle of the text in radians (character slant)

title: IDrawingDoc.CreateOrdinateDim4
signature:

,

,

Val
,

,
   System.Double

parameters.name: P1
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector that specifies the direction of the ordinate dimension

parameters.name: P2
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line start point

parameters.name: P3
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); extension line end point

parameters.name: P4
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); unit vector and specifies the orientation of the text; for example, (1, 0, 0) results in horizontal text read from left to right

parameters.name: P5
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x,y,z); position of text

parameters.name: Angle
parameters.description: Inclination angle of the text in radians (character slant)

remarks: SOLIDWORKS creates this type of dimension between the two specified points. The dimension is not related to the geometry.
